gurmukhi: ਚੰਚਲਾ ਪ੍ਰਅੰਗੀ ਬੇਦ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਗੀ ਤੇਜ ਤੁਰੰਗੀ ਖੰਡ ਅਸੁਰੰ ||
translation: Thou hast a winsome body like lightning, Thou art associated thematically with Vedas, O demon-destroying Deity! Thou hast very swift horses to ride upon.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਸਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਗਾਧ ੳੁਰਧੰ ||੧੨||੨੨੨||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Aadh Anaadh Agaddh Urdhan||12||222||
translation: Hail, hail, O Slayer of Mahishasura, the Primal, beginningless, Unfathomable, the Uppermost Deity.12.222.

gurmukhi: ਘੰਟਕਾ ਬਿਰਾਜੈ ਰੁਣ ਝੁਣ ਬਾਜੈ ਭ੍ਰਮ ਭੈ ਭਾਜੈ ਸੁਨਤ ਸੁਰੰ ||
transliteration: Ghantakaa Biraajai Roun Jhoun Baajai Bhram Bhai Bhaajai Sounat Suran||
translation: Listening to the tune of the harmonious resounding of the bell (in Thy camp), all the fears and illusions vanish away.

gurmukhi: ਕੋਕਲ ਸੁਨ ਲਾਜੈ ਕਿਲਬਿਖ ਭਾਜੈ ਸੁਖ ੳੁਪਰਾਜੈ ਮਧ ੳੁਰੰ ||
transliteration: Kokal Soun Laajai Kilbikh Bhaajai Souch Oupraajai Madh Uran||
translation: The nightingale, listening to the tune, feels inferior; the sins are effaced and joy wells up in the heart.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਜਨ ਦਲ ਦੱਝੈ ਮਨ ਤਨ ਰਿੱਝੈ ਸਭੈ ਨ ਭੱਜੈ ਰੋਹ ਰਣੰ ||
transliteration: Durjan Dal Dijjhai Man Tan Rijjhai Sabhai Na Bhajjai Roh Ranan||
translation: The forces of the enemies are scoched, their minds and bodies experience great suffening; when Thou showest Thy anger; in the battlefield, the forces cannot even run out of fear.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਚੰਡ ਚਕ੍ਰਤਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਗੁਰੰ ||੧੩||੨੨੩||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Channd Chakratan Aadh Guran||13||223||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura, masher of the demon Chand and worshipped from the very beginning. 13.223.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਚਰੀ ਪ੍ਰਜੋਧਨ ਦੁਸਟ ਬਿਰੋਧਨ ਰੋਸ ਅਰੋਧਨ ਕ੍ਰੂਰ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੇ ||
transliteration: Chaachari Prajodhan Doust Birodhan Rosdarodhan Kroor Brite||
translation: Thou hast superb arms and armour including sword, Thou art the enemy of tyrants, O Deity of frightful remperament: Thou stoppest only in great anger.

gurmukhi: ਧੂਮ੍ਰਾਛ ਬਿਧੁੰਸਨ ਪ੍ਰਲੈ ਪ੍ਰਜੁੰਸਨ ਜਗ ਬਿਧੁੰਸਨ ਸੁਧ ਮਤੇ ||
transliteration: Dhoomraachh Bidhounsan Pralai Prajounsan Jag Bidhounsan Sudh Mate||
translation: Thou art the destroyer of the demon Dhumar Lochan, Thou causest the final destruction and the devastation of the world Thou art the Deity of pure intellect.

gurmukhi: ਜਾਲਪਾ ਜਯੰਤੀ ਸਤ੍ਰ ਮਥੰਤੀ ਦੁਸਟ ਪ੍ਰਦਾਰਨ ਗਾੜ੍ਹ ਮਤੇ ||
transliteration: Jaalpaaa Jayantoo Satra Mathantoo Doust Pradaahan Gadrh Mate||
translation: Thou art the conqueror of Jalpa, the masherof enemies and thrower of tyrants in blaxe, O Deity of Profound intellect.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਨੰਗੀ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਗਤੇ ||੧੪||੨੨੪||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Aadh Jougaddh Agaddh(i) Gade||14||224||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura! Thou art the Primal and from the beginning of the ages, Thy discipline is Unfathomable. 14.224.

gurmukhi: ਖਤ੍ਰੀਅਾਣ ਖਤੰਗੀ ਅਭੈ ਅਭੰਗੀ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਨੰਗੀ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਗਤੇ ||
transliteration: Khatrooaan Khatanoo Abhai Abhanoo Aadh Ananoo Agaddh(i) Gade||
translation: O Destroyer of Kshatriyas! Thou art Fearless, Unassailable, Primal, body-less, the Deity of Unfathomable Glory.

gurmukhi: ਬ੍ਰਿੜਲਾਛ ਬਿਹੰਡਣਿ ਚੱਛੁਰ ਦੰਡਣਿ ਤੇਜ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡਣਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੇ ||
transliteration: Bridlaachh Bihanndan(i) Chachchhur Danndan(i) Tej Prachannddan(i) Aadh Brite||
translation: Thou art the Primal Power, the killer of the demon bridal and Punisher of the demon Chichhar, and intensely Glorious.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਰ ਨਰ ਪ੍ਰਤਿਪਾਰਣਿ ਪਤਿਤ ੳੁਧਾਰਣਿ ਦੁਸਟ ਨਿਵਾਰਣਿ ਦੋਖ ਹਰੇ ||
transliteration: Sur Nar Pratipaaran(i) Patit Udhaaran(i) Doust Nivaaran(i) Dokh Dare||
translation: Thou art the Sustainer of gods and men, Saviour of sinners, vanquisher of tyrants and destroyer of blemishes.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨਿ ਬਿਸ੍ਵ ਬਿਧੁੰਸਨਿ ਸ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਕਰੇ ||੧੫||੨੨੫||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan(i) Bisva Bidhounsan(i) Srist(i) Dare||15||225||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura! Thou art the Destroyer of the universe and Creator of the world. 15.225.
